title: NASA's Perseverance Mars rover completes its 1st drive planned by AI
desc: NASA's Perseverance rover has completed its first-ever drive on Mars planned by artificial intelligence, automating a labor-intensive decision-making process typically performed by human planners on Earth.

title: Commentary: There’s a quiet health evolution happening in Singapore
desc: An ageing population and rising costs are pushing Singapore to build healthcare into the environment and tools that influence behaviour, says SingHealth’s Low Lian Leng.
